action.action-desc: Mr. Blumenthal introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend authorities for the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to expand presumption of service connection for compensation for diseases the Secretary determines are associated with exposure to herbicide agents, and for other purposes.

section.header: Extension of authorities of Secretary of Veterans Affairs relating to presumption of service connection for compensation for diseases associated with exposure to herbicide agents
section.text: Section 1116(e) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking September 30, 2015 and inserting September 30, 2030.
